subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Russell Martin hit a three-run homer and Hiroki Kuroda pitched six effective innings in a win over the visiting Rays that kept the Yankees a game ahead of the Orioles in the American League East.
snippet: Russell Martin hit a three-run homer and Hiroki Kuroda pitched six effective innings in a win over the visiting Rays that kept the Yankees a game ahead of the Orioles in the American League East.
